languages.text: {n}В голосе Идиры, подключившейся к каналу, сквозит веселье.{/n} "Да брось, старик! Все эти "чудесастости", что на борту творятся, уже давно обросли легендами. То двери лупить створками начинают, то {g|Encyclopedia:Lumen}люмены{/g} стробоскопить... раз к этому все уже привыкли, наша барабашка решила что-то посущественнее отмочить — так что дальше будет только хуже!"

{n}Idira joins the channel and chimes in playfully,{/n} "Oh, don't start, old man! All these 'peculiar happenings' have long since turned into local legends. A door slams shut, a {g|Encyclopedia:Lumen}lumen{/g} starts flickering... Folk have grown used to all that, so our resident ghost has decided to up the ante. I'm telling you, things are only going to get worse from here!"
languages.original_text: {n}В голосе Идиры, подключившейся к каналу, сквозит веселье.{/n} "Да брось, старик! Все эти "чудесастости", что на борту творятся, уже давно обросли легендами. То двери лупить створками начинают, то {g|Encyclopedia:Lumen}люмены{/g} стробоскопить... раз к этому все уже привыкли, наша барабашка решила что-то посущественнее отмочить — так что дальше будет только хуже!"

A door slams shut, a {g|Encyclopedia:Lumen}lumen{/g} starts flickering... Folk have grown used to all that, so our resident ghost has decided to up the ante. I'm telling you, things are only going to get worse from here!"

languages.text: {n}伊迪拉加入了频道，开玩笑般地插话道。{/n}“噢，你又来了，老家伙！这些‘古怪的事情’早就变成这艘船的传说了，比如说，某扇门会砰地一下关上，或者某盏{g|Encyclopedia:Lumen}流明灯{/g}会突然闪烁起来……大家已经对这种事情见怪不怪了，所以咱们船上的鬼魂才决定干票大的。我告诉你，事情只会变得越来越糟！”
languages.original_text: {n}Idira joins the channel and chimes in playfully,{/n} "Oh, don't start, old man! All these 'peculiar happenings' have long since turned into local legends. A door slams shut, a {g|Encyclopedia:Lumen}lumen{/g} starts flickering... Folk have grown used to all that, so our resident ghost has decided to up the ante. I'm telling you, things are only going to get worse from here!"

traits.locale_text: {n}伊迪拉加入了频道，开玩笑般地插话道。{/n}“噢，你又来了，老家伙！这些‘古怪的事情’早就变成这艘船的传说了，比如说，某扇门会砰地一下关上，或者某盏{g|Encyclopedia:Lumen}流明灯{/g}会突然闪烁起来……大家已经对这种事情见怪不怪了，所以咱们船上的鬼魂才决定干票大的。我告诉你，事情只会变得越来越糟！”

languages.text: {n}Idira intervient d'une voix enjouée :{/n} « Oh, ne commencez pas, le vieux ! Tous ces événements sont depuis longtemps devenus des légendes locales. Une porte qui claque toute seule, un {g|Encyclopedia:Lumen}lumen{/g} qui clignote sans raison... Et comme tout le monde s'y est habitué, notre petit fantôme a décidé de passer à la vitesse supérieure, c'est tout. Je vous le dis, moi : à partir de maintenant, ça va être de pire en pire ! »
languages.original_text: {n}Idira joins the channel and chimes in playfully,{/n} "Oh, don't start, old man! All these 'peculiar happenings' have long since turned into local legends. A door slams shut, a {g|Encyclopedia:Lumen}lumen{/g} starts flickering... Folk have grown used to all that, so our resident ghost has decided to up the ante. I'm telling you, things are only going to get worse from here!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Idira intervient d'une voix enjouée :{/n} « Oh, ne commencez pas, le vieux ! Tous ces événements sont depuis longtemps devenus des légendes locales. Une porte qui claque toute seule, un {g|Encyclopedia:Lumen}lumen{/g} qui clignote sans raison... Et comme tout le monde s'y est habitué, notre petit fantôme a décidé de passer à la vitesse supérieure, c'est tout. Je vous le dis, moi : à partir de maintenant, ça va être de pire en pire ! »

languages.text: {n}Idira se une al canal y comenta, alegre.{/n} «¡No empecemos, anciano! Todos estos "sucesos peculiares" son ya leyendas locales. Una puerta que se cierra, un {g|Encyclopedia:Lumen}lumen{/g} intermitente... la gente se ha acostumbrado, así que nuestro fantasma local ha decidido aumentar las apuestas. ¡Seguro que vamos a peor desde ahora!».
languages.original_text: {n}Idira joins the channel and chimes in playfully,{/n} "Oh, don't start, old man! All these 'peculiar happenings' have long since turned into local legends. A door slams shut, a {g|Encyclopedia:Lumen}lumen{/g} starts flickering... Folk have grown used to all that, so our resident ghost has decided to up the ante. I'm telling you, things are only going to get worse from here!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Idira se une al canal y comenta, alegre.{/n} «¡No empecemos, anciano! Todos estos "sucesos peculiares" son ya leyendas locales. Una puerta que se cierra, un {g|Encyclopedia:Lumen}lumen{/g} intermitente... la gente se ha acostumbrado, así que nuestro fantasma local ha decidido aumentar las apuestas. ¡Seguro que vamos a peor desde ahora!».

languages.text: {n}イディラが通信に加わり、面白半分で話に割って入る。{/n}「あら、勘弁してよ、ご老人！そんな『怪奇現象』なんて全部とっくの昔に都市伝説になってるわ。ドアがひとりでに閉まったとか、{g|Encyclopedia:Lumen}ルーメン{/g}がチカチカしだしたとか…みんなもうそんなの慣れっこだから、我らが船の幽霊はハードルを上げることにしたのね。見てなさい、これからもっとひどいことになるわよ！」
languages.original_text: {n}Idira joins the channel and chimes in playfully,{/n} "Oh, don't start, old man! All these 'peculiar happenings' have long since turned into local legends. A door slams shut, a {g|Encyclopedia:Lumen}lumen{/g} starts flickering... Folk have grown used to all that, so our resident ghost has decided to up the ante. I'm telling you, things are only going to get worse from here!"

traits.locale_text: {n}イディラが通信に加わり、面白半分で話に割って入る。{/n}「あら、勘弁してよ、ご老人！そんな『怪奇現象』なんて全部とっくの昔に都市伝説になってるわ。ドアがひとりでに閉まったとか、{g|Encyclopedia:Lumen}ルーメン{/g}がチカチカしだしたとか…みんなもうそんなの慣れっこだから、我らが船の幽霊はハードルを上げることにしたのね。見てなさい、これからもっとひどいことになるわよ！」

languages.text: {n}Idira schaltet sich zu dem Kanal zu und sagt verschmitzt:{/n} "Ach, fangt bloß nicht damit an, alter Mann! All diese 'sonderbaren Vorkommnisse' sind schon längst zu lokalen Legenden geworden. Eine Tür, die zukracht, ein {g|Encyclopedia:Lumen}Lumen{/g}, das plötzlich zu flackern beginnt ... An so etwas haben sich die Leute längst gewöhnt, darum hat unser Geist entschieden, den Einsatz ein wenig zu erhöhen. Ich sage es Euch, es wird alles nur noch schlimmer werden!"
languages.original_text: {n}Idira joins the channel and chimes in playfully,{/n} "Oh, don't start, old man! All these 'peculiar happenings' have long since turned into local legends. A door slams shut, a {g|Encyclopedia:Lumen}lumen{/g} starts flickering... Folk have grown used to all that, so our resident ghost has decided to up the ante. I'm telling you, things are only going to get worse from here!"

languages.text: {n}İdira da kanala dâhil oluyor ve neşeyle şakıyor.{/n} "Sen hiç başlama ihtiyar! Tüm bu 'gizemli vakalar' yerel efsanelere dönüşeli çok oluyor. Bir kapı kendi kendine kapanır, bir {g|Encyclopedia:Lumen}lümen{/g} yanıp sönmeye başlar... İnsanlar bunlara alıştı, o yüzden de bu hayalet arkadaşımız bahsi daha da artırdı. Söylemedi demeyin, işler bundan sonra daha da kötü bir hâl alacak!"
languages.original_text: {n}Idira joins the channel and chimes in playfully,{/n} "Oh, don't start, old man! All these 'peculiar happenings' have long since turned into local legends. A door slams shut, a {g|Encyclopedia:Lumen}lumen{/g} starts flickering... Folk have grown used to all that, so our resident ghost has decided to up the ante. I'm telling you, things are only going to get worse from here!"
